abstract: Galleon Group, a $7 billion hedge fund known for its technology investments, is making a big bet on A.M.D.. Citing an unnamed trader involved in the trade, The New York Post said the fund has purchased “several million shares” of the chipmaker, which is struggling to keep pace with larger rival Intel.
lead_paragraph: Galleon Group, a $7 billion hedge fund known for its technology investments, is making a big bet on A.M.D.. Citing an unnamed trader involved in the trade, The New York Post said the fund has purchased “several million shares” of the chipmaker, which is struggling to keep pace with larger rival Intel.

headline.main: Galleon Is Said to Make Big Bet on A.M.D. Shares
